org.apache.gearpump.cluster.appmaster

Class AppMasterRuntimeEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.gearpump.cluster.appmaster.AppMasterRuntimeEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class AppMasterRuntimeEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
implements akka.actor.Actor
    This serves as runtime environment for AppMaster. When starting an AppMaster, we need to setup the connection to master, and prepare other environments.

    This also extend the function of Master, by providing a scheduler service for Executor System. AppMaster can ask Master for executor system directly. details like requesting resource, contacting worker to start a process, and then starting an executor system is hidden from AppMaster.

    Please use AppMasterRuntimeEnvironment.props() to construct this actor.
